data.message: My account it's been hacked.  Someone change my profile number to a number from Pakistan.  2) I received 19 friends request from myself which I didn't request.  Plz.  Help me.  I try to chng my password but some one goes in side and recharge it. What should I do. Thank you. .... I use to have so much fun with friends before and now I'm scare.

replies.message: We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this, Maria. If your account was taken over by someone else, please secure it here: http://bit.ly/2bulxAD. -Jessica
